elements.name: info
elements.html: Please choose a more accurate mapping category for each of the following categories.

choices.text: "手机 ▶ 手机通讯 ▶ 手机"
"电脑、办公 ▶ 电脑整机 ▶ 平板电脑"
No one above is obviously better than the other.
